name: Offside (itch) (Adyan27)
description:
Further Levels Feature More Players Which Will Divert Your Attention And Will Run Faster Making The Game More Challenging

---

Controls:

Tab  - Pause/Unpause

A/D or Left/Right - Movement 

Space - Call Offside

"Automatically Follow Last Defender" Toggle Will Make Camera Follow Offside Line And Allow The Best Position To Make A Decision

---

Right Decision Gives 1 Point

Wrong Decision Takes 2 Points

Once You Reach 0 Points You Have To Restart
